title: Awards | Engineering Alumni | University of Illinois at Chicago
contents: It all starts with a single spark          Skip to the content of this page ,  the main menu , the secondary menu , the site search form , the site home page .           Engineering Alumni     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Engineering Alumni      Engineering Alumni   Main Menu    News           Dean's List    RISE Magazine         Events           Upcoming Events         Get Involved           Join us on LinkedIn    Become a Mentor    Volunteer    Engineer your own involvement    Honor a Professor         Awards           2019 Alumni Award Honorees    2018 Alumni Award Honorees    2017 Alumni Award Honorees         Give    Contact     Eyebrow menu    College of Engineering    Engineering Career Center    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                     Awards      View Menu            The UIC College of Engineering and the UIC Engineering Alumni Association host the Annual Alumni Awards Dinner. Individuals are recognized in several categories, including overall achievement or distinction in one's chosen profession; distinguished service toward enriching the lives of others and the welfare of humanity; significant professional leadership contributions as a young engineer; significant advocacy for and service to the College of Engineering; and significant lasting achievement as a Navy Pier alumnus/a.  The deadline for nominations is June 30, 2020. The Alumni Awards Selection Committee is composed of alumni and staff of the UIC College of Engineering and selects the recipient for each department. A maximum of six awards will be made for the Outstanding Achievement Award. All other award categories will have one winner. Should the committee determine that the nominee would be more appropriately honored by means of a different award, it reserves the right to consider each nominee for other, more suitable recognition. Awards will be presented at the Annual Alumni Awards Dinner in the fall.  To nominate an individual, click on any of the five categories below to find the nomination form.      awards        Outstanding Achievement Award  This award is presented to alumni who, through their achievement in their field of engineering (read more)          Distinguished Service Award  This award is presented to alumni who, through their outstanding professional contributions (read more)          Outstanding Young Engineer Award  This award is presented to outstanding young engineering alumni (read more)          Legacy Alumni Achievement Award  This award is presented to a Navy Pier alumnus/a who has made a lasting and meritorious contribution (read more)          Champion's Award  This award is presented to an individual or company that demonstrates a strong commitment to the College (read more)              Awards           2019 Alumni Award Honorees    2018 Alumni Award Honorees    2017 Alumni Award Honorees
